document_data.mainbody:
ordio Muffinhead was a dwarf priest from Mithral Hall in the late 14 century DR.
He treated King Bruenor Battlehammer when he was struck by magic and put into a coma in the .
The reincarnated Regis disguised himself as Cordio in Elturgard on the Trade Way to Triel in 1481 DR.
